member.name: P:JetBrains.ProjectModel.IAssemblyFileData.LastWriteTime
member.summary: Time of last modification of the corresponding file on the file system. Note that this value is cached and is updated only when the synchronization with the file system is performed. That is, the value returned by this method may sometimes differ from the actual modification stamp of the physical file, if the file was modified since last synchronization with the file system.

member.summary: Marks the file as reconciled, i.e. its persistent and in-memory version are identical, by assigning its external version timestamp the same value as of the in-memory version

member.summary: Marks the file as reconciled, i.e. its persistent and in-memory version are identical, by assigning its in-memory version timestamp the same value as of the external version

member.summary: Create new read-only stream for this file Don't forget to dispose it!

member.summary: Creates new writable stream for this file Don't forget to dispose it!

member.summary: Timestamp corresponding to the last external modification

member.name: P:JetBrains.ProjectModel.IProjectFile.LastWriteTime
member.summary: Time of last modification of the corresponding file on the file system. Note that this value is cached and is updated only when the synchronization with the file system is performed. That is, the value returned by this method may sometimes differ from the actual modification stamp of the physical file, if the file was modified since last synchronization with the file system.
